UC San Diego Health System, along with UC San Diego School of Medicine and Skaggs School of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences comprise UC San Diego Health Sciences, which over the past four decades has gained international recognition as a place where discoveries are delivered – bringing breakthroughs from the research lab bench to patients’ bedsides.

UCSF Medical Center is recognized throughout the world for innovative patient care, advanced technology and pioneering research. We are one of the nation's top 10 hospitals, according to an annual survey by U.S. News & World Report. For more than a century, we have offered the highest quality medical treatment.

"Our goal is to provide the best patient experience with every patient, every encounter, every time." For more than half a century, UCLA Health has provided the best in healthcare and the latest in medical technology to the people of Los Angeles and throughout the world.
Comprised of Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, UCLA Medical Center, Santa Monica, Resnick Neuropsychiatric Hospital at UCLA, Mattel Children's Hospital UCLA, and the UCLA Medical Group with its wide-reaching system of primary-care and specialty-care offices throughout the region, UCLA Health is among the most comprehensive and advanced healthcare systems in the world.
Our physicians are world leaders in the diagnosis and treatment of complex illnesses, and our hospitals are among the best in the country. Consistently ranked one of the top five hospitals in the nation and the best in the western United States by U.S. News & World Report, UCLA Health is at the cutting edge of biomedical research, and our doctors and scientists are leaders in performing pioneering work across an astounding range of disciplines, from organ transplantation and cardiac surgery to neurosurgery and cancer treatment, and bringing the latest discoveries to virtually every field of medicine
One of Hawaii's leading health insurers, UHA provides medical, drug, and vision plans to Hawaii employer groups.

UnitedHealthcare Military & Veterans, a UnitedHealthcare business, draws on the unmatched experience and expertise of the UnitedHealth Group family of companies to provide affordable, high-quality health care to active duty military, retirees, and their families.
Working with CLIA certified labs, BioIQ has developed modern diagnostic tests to detect the most common disease conditions in the United States.
UnitedHealthcare is an operating division of UnitedHealth Group, the largest single health carrier in the United States.
UnityPoint Health has a vision for health care, and it starts with you: "Best outcome for every patient every time."
The mission of University Health Care System is to provide health care services which help the citizens of our communities achieve and maintain optimal health.
We treat the most important health concerns - yours. We provide healthcare services designed to meet your needs at every stage of your life.

organization: University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences
description: The University of Arkansas for Medical Sciences (UAMS) is Arkansas' only comprehensive academic health center with outreach programs operating in every county and a regional campus in Northwest Arkansas.

Since University Hospital in Salt Lake City, Utah opened its doors in 1965, we’ve grown from a single hospital to an extensive health care system that includes four hospitals and 10 neighborhood health centers staffed by 1,000 board-certified University of Utah physicians trained in 200 medical specialties.
The UVA Medical Center includes the hospital, trauma center and primary and specialty care locations throughout Central Virginia.

​​​​​University of Washington Medical Center is one of the nation's leading academic medical centers, which provides highly specialized medical care in areas such as cardiology, high-risk pregnancy and neonatal intensive care, oncology, orthopaedics and organ transplantation. Patients travel from across Washington, Wyoming, Alaska, Montana and Idaho for these specialized services.

organization: UPMC Health Plan (University of Pittsburgh Medical Center)
description: UPMC Health Plan is owned by the University of Pittsburgh Medical Center (UPMC), one of the nation's top-ranked health systems. As part of an integrated health care delivery system, UPMC Health Plan partners with UPMC and community network providers to improve clinical outcomes as well as the health of the greater community.

My HealtheVet is VA’s online personal health record. It's designed for Veterans, active duty service members, their dependents and caregivers. My HealtheVet helps you partner with your health care team. It provides you opportunities and tools to make informed decisions and manage your health care.

Virtual Care Works (VCW) is a United States Corporation, registered in Colorado.  VCW conducts business in the Health and Life Science business verticals of the U.S. Health industry.  VCW is a medical grade electronic health data transfer company.  VCW differentiates itself from other Telehealth companies by securing allocated bandwidth on which clients send personal health information (electronic health records) using the VCW private Internet and not the public Internet used by other companies. The combination of HIPAA security and private bandwidth allows for extremely high quality of service that is virtually un-penetrable from criminal hackers. 
	VCW offers a focused suite of products for HIPAA secure medical data transfers:
•	Secure Network infrastructure - Dell, Juniper, Level 3, Microsoft, Apple
•	Video Communications/Conferencing - Vidyo
•	Secure Email within the network 
•	Secure Texting (ios, android, smartphone, tablet, iPad, desktop, hard-wire, wireless, (Wi-Fi) 
•	Large File Transfer Protocols for movement of electronic patient record2.
